text: Map showing ancient Thessaly. Phaeca is shown to the centre left near Mount Cercetium. Pialia () or Pialeia (Πιάλεια) was a town of Histiaeotis in ancient Thessaly, at the foot of Mount Cercetium. The location of Pialia is at a place called Skoumbos. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Histiaeotis
title: Pialia
